alert.note: Alert for Burnett; Douglas; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 6:28AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Pine, southeastern St. Louis, eastern Carlton, western Douglas, northwestern Washburn and northeastern Burnett Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 628 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Cotton, to Scanlon, to near Mille Lacs Band Lena Lake Area, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Superior, Cloquet, Hermantown, Virginia, Eveleth, Proctor, Hoyt Lakes, Gilbert, Aurora, Babbitt, Hawthorne, Scanlon, Biwabik, Carlton, Poplar, Cotton, Wrenshall, Oliver, Webb Lake Wisconsin, and Dairyland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
